entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
